name: Strange Dreams: The Premonition
description:
Mouse has just been discharged from the hospital following a dissociative episode, but he’s about to find out that things are only going to get stranger.

Strange Dreams: The Premonition is an interactive fiction about being in the eye of the storm. Before it gets better, it’s going to get worse.

--

This is my first time using Twine, so I wanted to throw together something short to try it out! It was meant to have background music but I have no idea how to code that into Twine! Maybe pretend there's really cool ambient background music, I don't know.
